rows.label: tlk43300146_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Yuou's shop is tended by the
daughter of the Gaselart family.

rows.label: tlk43300146_01_msg0002
rows.name:
It would normally be unthinkable to
have the daughter of a noble house
working in a shop, but...

rows.label: tlk43300146_01_msg0003
rows.name:
It seems like the lady herself has
taken a liking to Yuou's desserts...

rows.label: tlk43300146_01_msg0004
rows.name:
She begged to be allowed to work
there, so even I was swayed by
her zeal.

rows.label: tlk43300146_01_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm really happy Yuou's shop,
Just Desserts, has come to fruition.

rows.label: tlk43300146_01_msg0006
rows.name:
Now with the girl's help, it seems
likely business will further improve,
so we'll be counting on your support!
